EmailTemplate.name: Submission Confirmation - Online
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Application Submission
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Student_Programme__c.Student__c},
Thank you for submitting your application for the {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c}, {!Student_Programme__c.Programme_Type__c}, and for your interest in studying online with the Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine.
Once your application has been submitted for processing, we aim to provide confirmation as soon as possible, usually within a couple of days. We don't anticipate this taking longer than 10 working days maximum.
If you have any queries about your application, please e-mail MyLSTM@lstmed.ac.uk
Have a great day.
Yours sincerely
The Admissions Team The Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine Pembroke Place Liverpool L3 5QA
